title: Block creation is not working
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2022.99.99-dev-c1214e4a`

OS & Version: `MacOS Monterey Version 12.5`

Commit hash : `c1214e4ac5c987461c84a7eae12e755922e5df3d`

#### Expected behaviour

When sending transactions, new blocks should be created, transactions should be mined

#### Actual behaviour

Transactions are stuck in `pending`

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

1. launch erigon locally `sudo ./erigon --datadir=dev --chain dev --private.api.addr=localhost:9090 --mine --http=false --http.port=8545`
2. launch rpcdaemon locally `sudo ./rpcdaemon --datadir=dev --private.api.addr=localhost:9090 --http.api=eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool,parity --http.port 8545`
3. in metamask , connect to localhost and send transaction

#### Backtrace

This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
This issue was closed because it has been stalled for 7 days with no activity.
